Package org.jchassis.geom.int2d

An API for the 2D space i x j, where i and j are Java 'int' values.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Dimension An interface representing a dimension (i.e.
Point An interface representing a point in the space of points i x j, where i and j are Java 'int' values.
 

Class Summary
ConstantDimension An immutable dimension.
ConstantPoint An immutable point.
Direction A direction (also called a vector) in the space of point i x j, where i and j are Java 'int' values.
 

Package org.jchassis.geom.int2d Description

An API for the 2D space i x j, where i and j are Java 'int' values.
